intro: Psychotria vanimoensis, commonly known as the Vanimo psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the rainforests of New Guinea and is characterized by its elliptical, dark green leaves. The plant produces small, fragrant white flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. It is often found growing in shaded, moist environments within the understorey of tropical forests. Its botanical features make it an important component of the ecological diversity in its native habitat.
